answers: The University accommodation fee ranges from Kshs 5000/- to Kshs 8000/- depending on the number of beds per room per semester.

utterances: Do PSSP and Jab Students Pay The Same Accomodation Fee?
Do PSSP pay the same ammount for accommodation as JAB?
JAB and PSSP pay the same accomodation fees
Do private sponsored students pay the same ammount as the goverment sponsored students?
answers: Yes. Both the privately sponsored and the government sponsored students pay the same accommodation fee.

utterances: Who Is Eligible To Apply For A Hostel?

which student can have hostels
who can apply for hostel online
who can book hostel online
answers: The University provides an online platform where ONLY FIRST YEARS can login and book for accommodation.

utterances: Does The University Monitor The Private Rented Accommodation It Advertises To Its Students?
does the university monitor private rented accommodation
does the univaersity monitor private hostels
does university controls the private hostels
are the adverised hostels safe
are non-residence hostels safe
does privete hostels offer condusive enviroment
are private hostels clean
what measures does the university take against private hostels
answer: Yes. The University oversees all the private hostels to ensure that they provide a conducive environment for students in terms of security, cleanliness and other general aspects before we allow them to advertise to our students.

utterances: What support does the University offer to ensure that students get work?
Does univeristy surport students to get work
Do I get work after completing a course
do I get work after study
Does the university offer work to students
how do mmust students get work
Am I in a position of getting work after completing a course
answer: Employability is embedded into the wide range of degree courses provided by the University. We also have a Directorate of Career Services which provides support with job application. MMUST provides its students with all that they require to enter the world of work.

utterances: Who can use the University Library?

who can use the library
who is allowed into the library
who can enter the library

is library open to everyone
answer: The teaching, non-teaching and students are the bona fide members who have a right to read and borrow academic material from the University Library.

utterances: Who qualifies to sit for University Examinations?
Who can sit for exam
Who can take the exams
Who is allowed to sit for exams
who is allowed to take exams
Can anyone take the exams
Can everyone take the exams
Is exam for everyone
answer: Only bona fide students are allowed to sit for University examinations. These are students who have paid fees in full and have reported online and registered for the prescribed semester courses.

utterances: Does the University offer Part Time Courses?
does mmust offer part time courses
do you offer part time courses
are there part time courses at mmust
can mmust offer part time course
answers: Yes. Part time courses are mostly available in post graduate programmes. Different Schools provide different schedules for part time courses depending on the preferences of the students.

utterances: What are the Key Dates in the University Academic Calendar?
key dates in the university calender
what are the key dates in the university calender
what are the key dates in the university calender
Are there key dates in the university academic calender
academic calender key dates
answers: We have in-takes in January, May and September of each year. Graduation is normally conducted in December and only on special occasion can it be conducted in July. KUCCPS students are enrolled between August and September of each year. Students go for long holidays between May and September.

utterances: How long does it take to get a reply after a Successful Course Application
How long does the reply to a course application take
Duration for before a course application reply
Where should the students pick their transcripts
Where can i pick my transcript
where are transcript picked
answers: School level provisional results are picked at the various Schools whereas official transcripts are picked from the Office of the Registrar (Academic Affairs.)

utterances: What Is The MMUST Talent Scholarship
mmust talent scholarship
Tell me about mmust talent scholarship
what about mmust talent scholarship
answers: This is an initiative by the University to give back to the society through providing sponsorship to the talented students in the various sports and entertainment programmes.

utterances: Does the University admit International Students
Do you accept international students
Am a foreign student.Can i be admited
answer: Yes. The University does admit qualified International students who have applied and have their certificates equated with the Kenyan education system, that is, Commission for University Education (CUE), Kenya National Examination Council (KNEC) and Kenya National Qualifications Authority (KNQA).

utterances: Does The University offer Short and Bridging Courses
does university offer short courses
Do you offer short courses
can i take short courses
I want to take a short course
answers: The University offers short courses ranging from 5 days - 4 months. Currently, we do not provide bridging programmes.

utterances: Does the University provide Scholarships to Students?
Do you offer scholarships
answers: Yes. Masters and PhD students are allowed to teach some units within the University. The stipend they receive is used to cater for their academic requirements.
The University provides internship opportunities to its alumni only. Conversely, for courses not offered at the University, we recruit the most competent interns from other universities.
